channel.title: 565 coding help-yell hex
channel.description: I'm using a Tko based source, but when i add hex colors with text, it only works when i make that person staff. Example: I made a account a donator, and then added hex colors on his yell. When he types :yell (text) it shows up as donator with green text, which is default for a donators yell. When i make him a admin, the hex colors and text shows up. When a normal player does ::yell it tells him to use the "`" command panel, and when he tries it, it tells him he's not members plus. So basically what i am asking, is how do i make it where normal players can yell with hex colors, only when i code it into commandprompthandler?

item.title: 565 coding help-yell hex
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

just thowing this out there, but mabye the client only shows it if they are an admin?

or another guess, if there is no rights for the player, it does not “update” the text part.
by that i mean when you are mod or admin, it has to add a crown. when your not, you dont o.o get meh? =3

Read full topic

item.title: 565 coding help-yell hex
item.dc:creator: @pure_x_k0er pure x k0er
item.description:
@pure_x_k0er wrote:

What i mean is, i don’t want every normal playing yelling with custom hex colors. I want only certain people to be able to use it. i use
if (player.getUsername().equals(“prodigy”)) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=FF00CC><shad=000033>[Pk_King]"+player.getDisplayName()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText));
continue;
}
but that only works when i make them a admin.

Read full topic

item.title: 565 coding help-yell hex

item.description:
@pure_x_k0er wrote:

I’m using a Tko based source, but when i add hex colors with text, it only works when i make that person staff.
Example: I made a account a donator, and then added hex colors on his yell. When he types :yell (text) it shows up as donator with green text, which is default for a donators yell. When i make him a admin, the hex colors and text shows up. When a normal player does ::yell it tells him to use the “`” command panel, and when he tries it, it tells him he’s not members plus. So basically what i am asking, is how do i make it where normal players can yell with hex colors, only when i code it into commandprompthandler?
